name: Pumpkin Forest (Finnn)
description:
Fight through flora and fauna to reach the end of the forest

Controls:

WSAD : Move

Click : Attack in direction of mouse

Featuring:

- 8 floors of randomly generated forest dungeon

- 12 enemy types

- money and upgrade system

- a lot of slimes

Made with Unity for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021

Music from https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
